data.message:
Are you...

**At home with the kids, needing to find some extra income but thinking it's not worth it because of childcare costs??

** Fed up with hours that don't suit you??

** Working full-time and needing extra cash to pay off a bill or to go on vacation??

** Working part-time and needing to supplement your income??

** College student struggling to find a job that fits your schedule??

** Looking for a new challenge??

** I'm looking for 5 people to join my team!! Send me a message if your interested!!

18 YEARS OR OLDER! USA, CANADA,ONLY!
